entry.title: [FF] I take back everything I said about the LOTR TV series\*. I'm already getting ha
entry.content:
I take back everything I said about the LOTR TV series\*. I'm already getting half a billion dollars worth of [entertainment](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FYS5d_YUEAAPl2D?format=jpg&name=orig) from it, and I'm not even gonna watch.
Also my deeply closeted white trash middle school boyfriend turning out to be Sauron is an acceptable twist, if a lazy and obvious one.
> \* note: I have previously said nothing about the LOTR TV series
